Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER PROTECTION

Title: Relates to false representation of affiliation or approval of state or local agencies as false advertising
Summary: Provides that a false representation of affiliation or approval, or false implication of such affiliation or approval, of any official, state or local agencies or other official source, shall be false advertising.
LawCode: Amd ยง350-a, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to false representation of affiliation or approval of state or local agencies
